channel.title: Trade option(npc)
channel.description:
how do i add the trade option to a npc i got the change name thingy but what do i put for trade option heres wat i got in class5: [code=abap] if(i == @@@@) { // NPC ID class5.aString65 = "**********"; // NPC name class5.aByteArray89 = "#########".getBytes(); // Examine description }[/code]
wat can i put in middles of npc name nd npc examine info to get the trade option [317 delta] [color=red]help):
